A purple location services icon will appear next to an item that has recently used your location.
Cancel
Location Services will be disabled for all apps, but your personalized Location Services settings for apps will be temporarily restored if you use Find My iPad to enable Lost Mode.
Location Services will be disabled for all apps, but your personalized Location Services settings for apps will be temporarily restored if you use Find My iPhone to enable Lost Mode.
Location Services will be disabled for all apps, but your personalized Location Services settings for apps will be temporarily restored if you use Find My iPod to enable Lost Mode.
Turn Off
Allow your iPad to learn places you frequently visit in order to provide useful location-related information.
Allow your iPhone to learn places you frequently visit in order to provide useful location-related information.
Allow your iPod to learn places you frequently visit in order to provide useful location-related information.
Frequent Locations
Frequent Locations
Frequent Locations
Location Services uses crowd-sourced Wi-Fi hotspot locations to determine your approximate location.
Location Services uses crowd-sourced WLAN hotspot locations to determine your approximate location.
Location Services uses GPS along with crowd-sourced cell tower locations to determine your approximate location.
Location Services uses GPS along with crowd-sourced Wi-Fi hotspot and cell tower locations to determine your approximate location.
Location Services uses GPS along with crowd-sourced WLAN hotspot and cell tower locations to determine your approximate location.
Using Location Services requires turning on Wi-Fi.
Using Location Services requires turning on WLAN.
Find My iPad allows you to locate this iPad on a map, send it messages, and remotely lock or erase it.
Find My iPhone allows you to locate this iPhone on a map, send it messages, and remotely lock or erase it.
Find My iPod allows you to locate this iPod on a map, send it messages, and remotely lock or erase it.
Find My iPad
Find My iPhone
Find My iPod
Show the Location Services icon in the status bar when you are tracking this iPad from another device.
Show the Location Services icon in the status bar when you are tracking this iPhone from another device.
Show the Location Services icon in the status bar when you are tracking this iPod from another device.

An outlined location services icon will appear next to an item that is using a geofence.
A geofence is a virtual perimeter around a location. Apps like Reminders use geofencing to notify you when you arrive at, or leave, these locations.
Location Services & Privacy
Location Services
Location Services
A gray location services icon will appear next to an item that has used your location within the last 24 hours.

Enter your Apple ID password to turn off Find My iPad and remove this iPad from your account.
